storyInfo: Cruelty and ruthlessness become the normal. People fear not judgment in the name of morality. There is no distinction between right and wrong, good and evil.

attributes.content: Here we are.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: ...You don't need to bother yourself with this, Talulah. The tractor's been missing for months. They were probably stopped by the Patrol Unit. There's not much we can do about it.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Even if all we can do is find their bodies, we'll at least be giving their families some closure.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If the intel recon gave us is correct, this should be the area where they'd gone missing.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Talulah, snap out of it! Everything they said is just a load of horseshit.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They're just a bunch of heartless bastards... Don't let it get to you!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: None of them had the willpower to keep going, to leave the tundra! They fought so many battles with you, and they thought you a coward?! You're the most fearless soldier among us!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Talulah, trust me. All of us follow you by will!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Captain Buldrokkas'tee used to be an Ursus soldier, but we all know he's the most steadfast man we have! All of us trust him!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Not necessarily. He's strong. Way too strong. Stubborn, too. The people who didn't trust him were just afraid to speak up.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It only takes a brief moment for trust to completely crumble. If all the people who followed Patriot died one day, would the ones who come after them be as steadfast as them?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Rumors can destroy us. Before there are rumors, those who are innocent are innocent, and those who are skeptical of others are also innocent.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But no one is innocent once rumors begin to spread.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But what does your upbringing has to do with anything?! You've done so much for all of us!
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: It's fine. Calm down.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Besides, I haven't really done all that much for them.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Come on, don't say that.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to go by yourself? Faust has been tagging along with those crossbow guys lately, and he's really getting the hang of it. If the guerrillas aren't around, you could bring them with...
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Protecting the Infected traveling with us is our top priority. We aren't fighting this war just to fight a war. Our goal is to help our fellow men survive. Don't put the cart before the horse.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Protecting them is our top priority.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Know this by heart, and make sure everyone else does as well.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Well... godspeed.
attributes.name: Infected Fighter

attributes.content: Don't worry. It's just negotiating with the locals. Everything will be fine.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: At a nearby village.
Before, I probably would've just run inside and started asking questions right away.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I wonder when did I become like this.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Hiding and sneaking around... It was just being suspicious and cautious at first, but this is practically antagonizing everyone now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm not even sure if it is unexpected things that I'm worried about or a repeat of those tragedies.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What a rundown place. Looks like they didn't have much of a harvest this year. Everyone looks so tired.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Weird. It should've been a while since the last time this village resettled, but there's a lot of tractor marks around the village's entrance.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: There are scraps at the assembly workshop... but I don't think they're from the village's old tractors. The authentication box is gone. If the vehicle belonged to the village, there's no reason to take that out...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's getting dark. I should take a look at the junkyard.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: This is weird. There's your household garbage, but there isn't much else.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No equipment for processing spent Originium here? If it's not in the junkyard, then where?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It's winter, so there should be wheat straws and warming grass husks everywhere. Did they run into food problems?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...No... that's not right. They burned them. I need to check out their granary.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What's this? What... What happened here?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: There's Originium residue all over the place... and the ground is dug up all over the place.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Claw marks... on the granary's door—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ahh—!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Who's there?!
Talulah turns around.
She finds an Ursus farmer standing there with his guard up. The farmer notices how Talulah is dressed and sets his shovel down.
Geez... what's the matter with you, coming inside the village without saying a word?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Haven't ever seen you before... Are you from the Gendarmerie?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You aren't here for the rent, are you? We already paid our Originium tax. Hell, the taxman took our food too while he was at it. There isn't much more we can pony up.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: I'm here since I'm investigating the Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Oh, Infected? We don't have any here.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Has any Infected passed by?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: We received a message. I know there's been Infected here. If you know what's good for you, spill it.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Urgh, can't fool you, eh.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Those scumbags. They said no one knew they were passing through here.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: So they were here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Damn right they did. They had those scary weapons on them. Scared the life out of us!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: We didn't have the guts to go against them, and we didn't try to.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: After that, they even took all of our food, those bastards! Please, you have to get these Infected... these criminals for us!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: That's not right.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: That's not right...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: How dare you say that?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: How dare you say that...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: How dare you say that!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: What's the matter with you, ma'am?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You heard their cries!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You heard them crying out for help...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You heard them clawing at the door with their fingers!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: W-What are you... ma'am...
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You right in the head?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Hey, over here!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Any of you seen her before? Where is she from?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Right, I haven't ever heard an accent like that before!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: ...Yeah, that's right! She doesn't have a mask on... If she was here to investigate the Infected, she'd be all decked out in protective equipment!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Answer me!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Just like the people you murdered, I'm an Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We've done nothing wrong.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You locked them in here. You let them die here.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What are we supposed to do? We don't even have any food left for ourselves!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You could've chased them away or just never allowed them in... You could've just attacked them or outright killed them, and I wouldn't be here complaining to you right now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But you tricked them. You lured them into your empty storehouse, locked the doors, and starved them.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They were so hungry, they couldn't even use their Arts... They were here only to panhandle. They weren't here to attack you. They didn't even have the strength to fight back. They were just normal people.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Normal? Those Infected? Don't make me laugh!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Who are you to reason with me, you Infected scumbag? You're just a freak!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You kept the storehouse locked until the Originium crystals stabilized. Then you disposed their bodies with the dried up Originium...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: They had families, they had friends, they had places they wanted to be... There's not even anything left of them. Infected often die and leave no traces left of their existence behind. That happens way too often, but now there isn't even a way for us to find out where their ashes have gone.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What are we supposed to do? It's not like we've got much to feed ourselves! Life's not easy for us either!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Then why did you lie to them?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: How could we have known what was going to happen to them? And what were we supposed to do?
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: That's just an excuse. You saw them starving... You knew they had no weapons to fend themselves with.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You did this because it was... convenient.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: From the beginning, you never... No, actually... Ha.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Even if they weren't Infected, you would've done the same thing.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: (Time to get rid of her. Get the sentries!)
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.text: You will come to see. These great lands you threw yourself to do not want you.

attributes.content: No. No.
Then what do you want? Look, it's all in the past. We'll even apologize.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: We can pretend you've never been here, just like those other folks were never here... All you have to do is walk away.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: Who do you even think they were?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Huh? Whatever you are, that's what they were.
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: You thought them weak, and in that case, that makes me a weakling who knows not how to fight back.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Ugh... Just get out of here already. We don't want no trouble here!
attributes.name: Ursus Farmer

attributes.content: They were here, begging at your feet, and what did you do?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.text: You will see your thoughts, your actions, become nonexistent.

attributes.content: No.
You're despicable.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: There will be no peace in this world while people like you still walk it.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The Infected patrols haven't been to your village in three years.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The noble family that controlled the settlements here died long ago during the Great Rebellion. Everything teetered on the edge of chaos, and your village has been left untended for years.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And yet... you killed all those people even though you had nothing to gain from their deaths.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If you had even a tiny bit of kindness in you... you would've let them go. The whole village heard their cries, but none of you did anything until they died, one after another.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If you still had any decency in you, you wouldn't have done anything this wretched.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I hate you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.text: You will see them spurn all you revered, your life, your dignity and philosophy void of all significance.

attributes.content: No!!
